Class UserApi

  • java.lang.Object

extends Object
    Use the UserApi to work with users. Created by Ozan Arslan on 13.07.2017

      • createUser

        public User createUser(User user,
                       String tenant)
        A method to create a user in the cloud from a pre-defined user object and return it.
        Parameters:
        user - the user to create/persist in the cloud
        tenant - a String with tenant name
        Returns:
        the same input user object

      • createUser

        public User createUser(String userName,
                       String tenant,
                       String firstName,
                       String lastName,
                       String password)
        A method to create a user in the cloud and return it by providing a userName, password, firstName, lastName and a tenant.
        Parameters:
        userName - of the user.
        tenant - of the tenant where the user resides.
        firstName - of the user.
        lastName - of the user.
        password - of the user.
        Returns:
        an instance of the user.

      • deleteUser

        public void deleteUser(User user,
                       String tenant)
        The method to delete a specific user from the cloud.
        Parameters:
        user - a user object of the user which should be deleted.
        tenant - a String with the name of the tenant.

      • deleteUserByUserName

        public void deleteUserByUserName(String userName,
                                 String tenant)
        The method to delete a specific user from the cloud by providing the username.
        Parameters:
        userName - a name of the user which should be deleted.
        tenant - a String with the name of the tenant.

      • addUserToGroup

        public void addUserToGroup(User user,
                           String tenant,
                           Group group)
        The method to add a specific user to a group.
        Parameters:
        user - a user object of the user which should be added to the group.
        tenant - a String with the name of the tenant.
        group - a group object the user used to be added to.

      • getRolesReferencesOfUser

        public RoleReferenceCollection getRolesReferencesOfUser(User user,
                                                        String tenant)
        The method to retrieve a collection of references (URLs) of roles that a user is assigned to.
        Parameters:
        user - a user object of the user whose roles references will be retrieved.
        tenant - a String with the name of the tenant.
        Returns:
        a collection of role references of a user.

      • assignRoleToGroup

        public void assignRoleToGroup(Group group,
                              Role role,
                              String tenant)

      • getRolesReferencesOfGroup

        public RoleReferenceCollection getRolesReferencesOfGroup(Group group,
                                                         String tenant)
        The groups can have more than one role. This method returns the collection of references of roles that the group is assigned to.
        Parameters:
        group - the group object of the group whose roles references will be retrieved.
        tenant - a String with the name of the tenant.
        Returns:
        collection of roles that the group is assigned to.

      • unassignRoleFromGroup

        public void unassignRoleFromGroup(Group group,
                                  Role role,
                                  String tenant)

      • updateUser

        public void updateUser(User user,
                       String tenant)
        The method to update the fields of a user in the cloud.
        Parameters:
        user - the user object with the new values to be stored. Id, username, password cannot be updated and will be ignored.
        tenant - a String with the name of the tenant.

        public void updateGroup(Group group,
                        String tenant)
